roleset.name: declare equal

example.name: all args
example.text: [The public]-1 has a tendency *trace*-1 to equate lawful demonstrations with non-violent civil disobedience.

example.name: passive
example.text: In practice, it-1 ends up *trace*-1 being equated *trace*-1 with a ``self-expression'' that encourages the youngsters' ``self-esteem.''
example.arg: with a ``self-expression'' that encourages the youngsters' ``self-esteem.''

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: In 1985 , the Medical Tribune reported that a growing number of critics are challenging the FDA bioequivalence - therapeutic - equivalence equation .

example.name: all args
example.text: The main feature of Descartes's physics, his equation of matter with extension, was particularly important.

roleset.note: EQUATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'equate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from equate.01-v predicate notes)
